alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 1:49PM EDT until June 04 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Somerset County in west central Maine... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 149 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Baker Lake, or 24 miles south of Saint Juste, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Baker Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
